column4: Hi all, I'm not much of a linux guy, can someone explain to me what "pts" means?
The context is in trying to understand this: "As the owner and user of the pts, simply allow others read/write access by chmodding it"
I'm not entirely sure what that is.  type man pts in the terminal and see if that gives you any more useful information
I did, alas, it wasn't immediatly helpful.  I'll keep digging
